better-player-list.settings.title: Player List Options
better-player-list.settings.header.toolt: Shows or hides the header sent by the server.
better-player-list.settings.footer.toolt: Shows or hides the footer sent by the server.
better-player-list.settings.hold.tooltip: If enabled, the list stays visible only while its key is held. If disabled, the key acts as a toggle.
better-player-list.settings.latency-symb:
Controls how latency is displayed.

When set to §lVanilla§r, the list uses the default Minecraft latency icons.

When set to §lNumbers§r, the list shows each player's exact latency in milliseconds.
